entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You delivered the first radio to camp beta.
entries.journal_entry_description: Find the next closest camp. Jeb Maris only knew an approximate location so you may need to search the area for the camp. When found, deliver a radio so that supplies can be coordinated.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: [Jeb Maris] Well, I guess those coordinates were wrong. You should search the immediate area. Put a waypoint down if you think you'll get lost.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: There should be someone in charge. Find that person and deliver the radio.
entries.task04_comm_message_text: [Jeb Maris] Great job! Come back to my location and I'll give you the rest of the radios.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Return to Zeb Maris and get the other radios.
